title: The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly | This Past Weekend #218
itunes:title: The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly | This Past Weekend #218
description:
Subscribe to the show on Apple Podcasts http://bit.ly/ThisPastWeekend_ Theo opens the show calling his friend and drummer for Bishop Gunn, Burne Sharp, and asks him about the experience opening up for the Rolling Stones. Then Theo recaps a disastrous Single Mom’s Night Out, and calls the guy who nominated the single mom for San Francisco. They then takes some responses for Will, the 22 year old that was feeling down about knocking up his 19 year old girlfriend, including one from friend of the podcast Jocko Willink. Theo then tells a traumatic story from his childhood, and closes the show with an impromptu call with a second single mom that came out to the show in San Francisco.
